SELECT m.*, u.userId, u.usernick, u.userimguuid, u.userimguploadpath, u.userimgfilename FROM MESSENGER m, USERINFO U WHERE m.reqId IN (#{user},#{contact}) AND m.resId IN (#{user},#{contact}) AND u.USERID = m.reqid ORDER BY m.MSGDATE DESC
